    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs implemeting alrorithms with given args.

        Runs implementJar() if args can be applied as "-jar class path". Runs implement() if args can be applied as "class path". Otherwise, saying why arguments is invalid

        Parameters:
        args - arguments for running from terminal.

      • implement

        public void implement​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                      java.nio.file.Path root)
               throws ImplerException
        Implement token and save it to root

        Specified by:
        implement in interface Impler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for.
        root - root directory.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if {@param token} is private or primitive. if {@param root} is invalid. if any other error occurred.
        See Also:
        Class, Path

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                         java.nio.file.Path jarFile)
                  throws ImplerException
        Implement token and save it to jarFile as .jar file.

        Generated class name will be same as classes name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface JarImpler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for.
        jarFile - target .jar file.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if error occures while implementing. if something gone wrong while working with files.
        See Also:
        Class, Path

      • recursiveDelete

        private boolean recursiveDelete​(java.io.File file)
        Returns true if file was deleted succesfully. False otherwise.

        If file is directory, deletes this directory recursivly with all content in it. Otherwise, deletes single file file.

        Parameters:
        file - File or directory to delete.
        Returns:
        true if file was deleted succesfully, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        File

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        String with {@param token} realization.

      • buildMethod

        private void buildMethod​(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                         java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
        Appends to the stringBuilder method default realization
        Parameters:
        method - method to build
        stringBuilder - java.lang.StringBuilder in which should return statement be appended
        See Also:
        Method, StringBuilder

      • buildMethodParameters

        private void buildMethodParameters​(java.lang.reflect.Parameter[] parameters,
                                   java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
        Appends to the stringBuilder all parameters divided by "," in "()".

        If parameters is empty, appends only "()".

        Parameters:
        parameters - all parameters of the method
        stringBuilder - java.lang.StringBuilder in which should return statement be appended
        See Also:
        Parameter, StringBuilder

      • buildMethodThrows

        private void buildMethodThrows​(java.lang.Class<?>[] exceptionTypes,
                               java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
        Appends to the stringBuilder "throws " + all exceptions from exceptionTypes + " ".

        If exceptionTypes is empty, nothing happens.

        Parameters:
        exceptionTypes - all exception for the method
        stringBuilder - java.lang.StringBuilder in which should return statement be appended
        See Also:
        Class, StringBuilder

      • buildMethodBody

        private void buildMethodBody​(java.lang.Class<?> returnType,
                             java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
        Appends to the stringBuilder "return " + default return value for returnType.
        Parameters:
        returnType - return type of the method.
        stringBuilder - java.lang.StringBuilder in which should return statement be appended.
        See Also:
        Class, StringBuilder

        private java.lang.String buildFileName​(java.lang.String simpleName)
        Concat two strings: simpleName and "Impl"
        Parameters:
        simpleName - simple name of class
        Returns:
        name of file + "Impl"

      • buildPackageName

        private java.lang.String buildPackageName​(java.lang.String packageName)
        Replaces all '.' in packageName on FILE_SEPARATOR_CHAR.
        Parameters:
        packageName - name of package where '.' should be replaced
        Returns:
        result string
